L

leftInstruction - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.GameUtil
This variable stores a character denoting a left turn is required.
leftMotor - Static variable in enum ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Game
This variable stores an EV3LargeRegulatedMotor object instance that allows control of the left motor connected to port A
LightLocalizer - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.localization
This class helps our robot to localize itself using the light sensor
LightLocalizer(Navigation, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.localization.LightLocalizer
This is the class constructor for the LightLocalizer class
LightPoller - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads
This class implements the Light Sensor Poller for our robot it runs pulls the sensor data every 50 miliseconds
LightPoller(SampleProvider[], float[][], SensorData) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads.LightPoller
This constructor creates an instance of the LightPoller class to provide distance data from an light sensor to our robot.
lightSensorTest() - Static method in enum ca.mcgill.ecse211.tests.ComponentTest
This method runs LightSensor tests
localizationTest() - Static method in enum ca.mcgill.ecse211.tests.ComponentTest
This method runs Localization tests
localize(int[]) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.localization.LightLocalizer
This method localizes our robot to an intersection of two black lines which serve as our origin and strives to face north.
localize(int) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.localization.UltrasonicLocalizer
This method decides whether to use rising or falling edge localization based on which button is pressed on our EV3 brick.
